Package PoolGame.Items

Class Ball

  • java.lang.Object
    • PoolGame.Items.Ball
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Drawable, Movable, Subject
    public class Ball
extends java.lang.Object
implements Drawable, Movable, Subject
    The ball class for all types of balls.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Ball

        public Ball​(java.lang.String colour,
            double xPos,
            double yPos,
            double xVel,
            double yVel,
            double mass,
            Ball.BallType type,
            BallPocketStrategy pocketAction)
     throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Initialise the ball based on the provided value
        Parameters:
        colour - The colour of the ball
        xPos - The original x position of the ball
        yPos - The original y position of the ball
        xVel - The x velocity of the ball
        yVel - The y velocity of the ball
        mass - The mass of the ball
        type - The type of the ball
        pocketAction - The action to be carried out when a ball fall into a pocket
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - One of the provided value is invalid

      • isColliding

        public boolean isColliding​(Ball ballB)
        Check if both balls are colliding. Note that the checks were done using rectangular bounds.
        Parameters:
        ballB - Another ball to check for collision.
        Returns:
        True if the balls are colliding, false otherwise. Will always return false if the ball is disabled or the provided ball is the same ball as the current instance.

      • handleCollision

        public void handleCollision​(Ball ballB)
        Update the balls velocity after they collide.
        Parameters:
        ballB - The ball that is colliding with the current ball

      • applyFriction

        public void applyFriction​(double friction)
        Apply friction to the ball and stop the ball if the velocity is below the specified minimum velocity.
        Specified by:
        applyFriction in interface Movable
        Parameters:
        friction - The friction multiplier, 0 is no friction, 1 is max friction.
